How about one where the arcbound creatures usually only go down on their owner's terms, due to indestructibility with [Darksteel Forge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Forge) and sac'ing to things like [Throne of Geth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Throne of Geth) and [Arcbound Ravager](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arcbound Ravager)?
